verses.text: Ayic ix onh yik'anxi meltzaj Jehová b'aj sacleminac cajcanb'ati, ix onh yik'ancot t'a Sion tik, ichato tonhej ix onh vayichani.
Ichato chi', ix onh te tzevaji, ix el cav yuj tzalajk'olal. Yuj chi' ix yal eb' ch'oc chonhab'il icha tik: Ha Jehová ix ak'anxi snivan wach'k'olal t'a eb', xchi eb'.
Yel toni, a Jehová ix ak'an snivan wach'k'olal t'ayonh, yuj chi' tzonh te tzalaj ticnaic.
Mamin, ak'nhej a wach'k'olal t'a quib'anh, icha tz'aj syaxb'i sat lum taquinh lu'um yuj ha' eluma' t'a lum Neguev.
Ha eb' tz'avvi t'a skal oq'uel, ol smol sat tas syavej eb' chi' t'a tzalajk'olal.
Wach'chom van yok' eb' ayic syavanem ixim inhat te nib'ab'il eb'. Palta ayic ol elul ixim trigo chi', axonhej b'it ol yak' eb' yuj tzalajk'olal ayic mek'b'ilxoq'ue ixim yuj eb'.
